mapper.select: select /*导师基本信息，申请类别的名称，申请表的申请类别id,申请表的状态码，状态码的描述*/ t.*,a2.apply_name as applyName,a.apply_id,a.status,s.inspect_describe from tutor_inspect t, /* 导师非免审表 */ apply a, /* 教师申请表 */ apply_type a2, /* 申请类别表 */ status_code s /*状态码表*/ where t.tutor_id = a.tutor_id /*基本信息连接*/ and a.apply_id = a2.apply_id /*申请类别连接*/ and a.status = s.code_id /*申请状态连接*/ and t.organization_id = #{departmentSecretaryId} /* 院系 id */ and a.status = 10 /* 院系秘书初审待审核 */
